      • searchDep

        public java.util.List<Flight> searchDep(java.lang.String ticketAgency,
                                        java.lang.String dep,
                                        java.lang.String date)
        Basic search operation. Needs input of departure location and date.
        Parameters:
        ticketAgency - ticketAgency identifies the ticket agency requesting the information
        dep - Departure airport that selected by a customer
        date - Departure date selected by a customer
        Returns:
        List that contains all of the Flight object builded after parsing the XML string and null if fail

      • buyTicket

        public void buyTicket(java.util.List<Order> orders)
        Process the choice made by costumer. Generate a reservation request. Needs input of costumer order.
        Parameters:
        orders - List of orders.

      • searchDep

        public java.util.List<Voyage> searchDep(java.lang.String dep,
                                        java.lang.String arv,
                                        java.lang.String date,
                                        int stopover)
        Advanced search with number of stop overs. Needs input of basic information of departure date and location. Needs input of advanced information of number of stop overs.
        Parameters:
        dep - Departure airport
        arv - Arrival airport
        date - Departure date
        stopover - Numbers of stop over
        Returns:
        List of Voyage objects after parsing the flight node tree

      • searchRet

        public java.util.List<Voyage> searchRet(java.lang.String dep,
                                        java.lang.String arv,
                                        java.lang.String date,
                                        java.lang.String arvdate,
                                        int stopover)
        Process result of search operation. Build a tree and parse it.
        Parameters:
        dep - Departure airport
        arv - Arrival airport
        date - Departure date
        arvdate - Arrival date
        stopover - Number of stop overs
        Returns:
        List of Voyage objects after parsing the flight node tree
